author: stefanprobst
message: update type for next/dynamic `loading` option to accept `ReactNode` (#76402)

files.patch:
@@ -1,4 +1,4 @@ -import React, { type JSX } from 'react' +import React from 'react' import Loadable from './loadable.shared-runtime' const isServerSide = typeof window === 'undefined' @@ -36,7 +36,7 @@ function convertModule

(mod: React.ComponentType

| ComponentModule

) { } export type DynamicOptions

= LoadableGeneratedOptions & { - loading?: (loadingProps: DynamicOptionsLoadingProps) => JSX.Element | null + loading?: (loadingProps: DynamicOptionsLoadingProps) => React.ReactNode loader?: Loader

| LoaderMap loadableGenerated?: LoadableGeneratedOptions ssr?: boolean
